name: Don't Look Back (itch) (Eski)
description:
⚠️ This is my first game, things may seem basic and that's because I am still learning how to create games in Unreal. ⚠️

ROADMAP

DISCORD

REDDIT

What is Don't Look Back?

Don't Look Back is a 3D Platformer created in Unreal Engine inspired by the Bhop Gamemode from Counter Strike and also Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy.

In Don't Look Back every move you make matters if you fall its back to the start, if you accidently leave the game or my poor programming knowledge causes you to crash its back to the start. There isn't levels there isn't lives there also isn't no fancy save game feature to save your progress.

Don't Look Back is a rage game its entire purpose is to enrage/confuse you, the game will trick you into making jumps what seem impossible when in reality there is an entirely different route secretly behind you. You will scream, you will cry and you will regret downloading I promise.
